personalInfo.name: Aklima Shampa
personalInfo.title: Frontend React Developer
personalInfo.description: Passionate frontend developer with a keen eye for creating beautiful and responsive web applications. I specialize in React.js and modern web technologies.

about.summary: I'm a junior frontend developer with a strong foundation in modern web development. My journey in web development started during my college years, and I've been passionate about creating user-friendly interfaces ever since.

projects.title: Modern E-commerce Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive dashboard for e-commerce analytics featuring real-time data visualization, inventory management, and sales tracking with a clean, modern UI.

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: An elegant weather application providing detailed forecasts, interactive maps, and severe weather alerts with a beautiful, minimalist design.

projects.title: Productivity Task Manager
projects.description: A feature-rich task management application with drag-and-drop organization, priority levels, and deadline tracking in an intuitive interface.
